Articles.Content:
So a mod I absolutely have fallen in love with is KVV - Kronal Vessel Viewer. But after tinkering around with it for a while, I've got some questions. Namely, how does one get all the fancy compiled pictures like these?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Or this? http://i.imgur.com/AurTwFx.jpg - Large image - linked for slow internets.

I assume it's just putting them into your image editor of choice (GIMP/Photoshop) and putting backgrounds behind them? Or is that functionality in KVV? And how do you get everything the same scale, for zooming purposes? There aren't any "ticks" for KVV, it's all a smooth zoom/rotate/translate.

I recall another mod with an almost identical functionality but I just can't remember the name. I can't be bothered to go searching from my phone. I think it was 'vessel exploder' or something... I'm probably way off. But you would load its GUI in game, set the parameters and click 'explode' to generate these blueprint style pictures of your ships. It was AWESOME to say the least and I was just thinking to myself the other day that hopefully its been maintained through the updates. Good luck on this
Yeah, more than likely they save images from KVV and then edit them together in Photoshop/GIMP.
